# isProximityMonitoringEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether proximity monitoring is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isProximityMonitoringEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Enable proximity monitoring only when your application needs to be notified of changes to the proximity state. Otherwise, disable proximity monitoring. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Not all iOS devices have proximity sensors. To determine if proximity monitoring is available, attempt to enable it. If the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDevice/isProximityMonitoringEnabled] property remains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], proximity monitoring isn’t available.

## Using the proximity sensor

- **proximityState**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the proximity sensor is close to the user.
